verses.arabic: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: The believers must (eventually) win through,-
verses.transliteration: Qad aflaha almu/minoon

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى صَلَاتِهِمْ خَـٰشِعُونَ
verses.translation: Those who humble themselves in their prayers;
verses.transliteration: Allatheena hum fee salatihimkhashiAAoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَنِ ٱللَّغْوِ مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.translation: Who avoid vain talk;
verses.transliteration: Wallatheena hum AAani allaghwimuAAridoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِلزَّكَوٰةِ فَـٰعِلُونَ
verses.translation: Who are active in deeds of charity;
verses.transliteration: Wallatheena hum lizzakatifaAAiloon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَـٰفِظُونَ
verses.translation: Who abstain from sex,
verses.transliteration: Wallatheena hum lifuroojihim hafithoon

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.translation: Except with those joined to them in the marriage bond, or (the captives) whom their right hands possess,- for (in their case) they are free from blame,
verses.transliteration: Illa AAala azwajihim awma malakat aymanuhum fa-innahum ghayru maloomeen

verses.arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
verses.translation: But those whose desires exceed those limits are transgressors;-
verses.transliteration: Famani ibtagha waraa thalikafaola-ika humu alAAadoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ
verses.translation: Those who faithfully observe their trusts and their covenants;
verses.transliteration: Wallatheena hum li-amanatihimwaAAahdihim raAAoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَوَٰتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
verses.translation: And who (strictly) guard their prayers;-
verses.transliteration: Wallatheena hum AAala salawatihimyuhafithoon

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ
verses.translation: These will be the heirs,
verses.transliteration: Ola-ika humu alwarithoon

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلْفِرْدَوْسَ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.translation: Who will inherit Paradise: they will dwell therein (for ever).
verses.transliteration: Allatheena yarithoona alfirdawsa humfeeha khalidoon

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن سُلَـٰلَةٍ مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: Man We did create from a quintessence (of clay);
verses.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna al-insana minsulalatin min teen

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ نُطْفَةً فِى قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
verses.translation: Then We placed him as (a drop of) sperm in a place of rest, firmly fixed;
verses.transliteration: Thumma jaAAalnahu nutfatan feeqararin makeen

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ خَلَقْنَا ٱلنُّطْفَةَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْعَلَقَةَ مُضْغَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْمُضْغَةَ عِظَـٰمًا فَكَسَوْنَا ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ لَحْمًا ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَـٰهُ خَلْقًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ
verses.translation: Then We made the sperm into a clot of congealed blood; then of that clot We made a (foetus) lump; then we made out of that lump bones and clothed the bones with flesh; then we developed out of it another creature. So blessed be Allah, the best to create!
verses.transliteration: Thumma khalaqna annutfataAAalaqatan fakhalaqna alAAalaqata mudghatanfakhalaqna almudghata AAithamanfakasawna alAAithama lahmanthumma ansha/nahu khalqan akhara fatabarakaAllahu ahsanu alkhaliqeen

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُم بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَيِّتُونَ
verses.translation: After that, at length ye will die
verses.transliteration: Thumma innakum baAAda thalikalamayyitoon

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ تُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: Again, on the Day of Judgment, will ye be raised up.
verses.transliteration: Thumma innakum yawma alqiyamatitubAAathoon

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلْخَلْقِ غَـٰفِلِينَ
verses.translation: And We have made, above you, seven tracts; and We are never unmindful of (our) Creation.
verses.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna fawqakum sabAAa tara-iqawama kunna AAani alkhalqi ghafileen

verses.arabic: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۢ بِقَدَرٍ فَأَسْكَنَّـٰهُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابٍۭ بِهِۦ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We send down water from the sky according to (due) measure, and We cause it to soak in the soil; and We certainly are able to drain it off (with ease).
verses.transliteration: Waanzalna mina assama-imaan biqadarin faaskannahu fee al-ardiwa-inna AAala thahabin bihi laqadiroon

verses.arabic: فَأَنشَأْنَا لَكُم بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ لَّكُمْ فِيهَا فَوَٰكِهُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: With it We grow for you gardens of date-palms and vines: in them have ye abundant fruits: and of them ye eat (and have enjoyment),-
verses.transliteration: Faansha/na lakum bihi jannatinmin nakheelin waaAAnabin lakum feeha fawakihukatheeratun waminha ta/kuloon

verses.arabic: وَشَجَرَةً تَخْرُجُ مِن طُورِ سَيْنَآءَ تَنۢبُتُ بِٱلدُّهْنِ وَصِبْغٍ لِّلْـَٔاكِلِينَ
verses.translation: Also a tree springing out of Mount Sinai, which produces oil, and relish for those who use it for food.
verses.transliteration: Washajaratan takhruju min toori saynaatanbutu bidduhni wasibghin lilakileen

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ لَعِبْرَةً ۖ نُّسْقِيكُم مِّمَّا فِى بُطُونِهَا وَلَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And in cattle (too) ye have an instructive example: from within their bodies We produce (milk) for you to drink; there are, in them, (besides), numerous (other) benefits for you; and of their (meat) ye eat;
verses.transliteration: Wa-inna lakum fee al-anAAamilaAAibratan nusqeekum mimma fee butoonihawalakum feeha manafiAAu katheeratun waminhata/kuloon

verses.arabic: وَعَلَيْهَا وَعَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ تُحْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: And on them, as well as in ships, ye ride.
verses.transliteration: WaAAalayha waAAala alfulki tuhmaloon

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: (Further, We sent a long line of prophets for your instruction). We sent Noah to his people: He said, "O my people! worship Allah! Ye have no other god but Him. Will ye not fear (Him)?"
verses.transliteration: Walaqad arsalna noohan ilaqawmihi faqala ya qawmi oAAbudoo Allaha malakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaqoon

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦ مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتَفَضَّلَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَنزَلَ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً مَّا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِىٓ ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: The chiefs of the Unbelievers among his people said: "He is no more than a man like yourselves: his wish is to assert his superiority over you: if Allah had wished (to send messengers), He could have sent down angels; never did we hear such a thing (as he says), among our ancestors of old."
verses.transliteration: Faqala almalao allatheenakafaroo min qawmihi ma hatha illa basharunmithlukum yureedu an yatafaddala AAalaykum walaw shaaAllahu laanzala mala-ikatan ma samiAAnabihatha fee aba-ina al-awwaleen

verses.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: (And some said): "He is only a man possessed: wait (and have patience) with him for a time."
verses.transliteration: In huwa illa rajulun bihi jinnatunfatarabbasoo bihi hatta heen

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
verses.translation: (Noah) said: "O my Lord! help me: for that they accuse me of falsehood!"
verses.transliteration: Qala rabbi onsurnee bimakaththaboon

verses.arabic: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ أَنِ ٱصْنَعِ ٱلْفُلْكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا وَوَحْيِنَا فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ ۙ فَٱسْلُكْ فِيهَا مِن كُلٍّ زَوْجَيْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَأَهْلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقَوْلُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَلَا تُخَـٰطِبْنِى فِى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّهُم مُّغْرَقُونَ
verses.translation: So We inspired him (with this message): "Construct the Ark within Our sight and under Our guidance: then when comes Our Command, and the fountains of the earth gush forth, take thou on board pairs of every species, male and female, and thy family- except those of them against whom the Word has already gone forth: And address Me not in favour of the wrong-doers; for they shall be drowned (in the Flood).
verses.transliteration: Faawhayna ilayhi ani isnaAAialfulka bi-aAAyunina wawahyina fa-ithajaa amruna wafara attannooru faslukfeeha min kullin zawjayni ithnayni waahlaka illaman sabaqa AAalayhi alqawlu minhum wala tukhatibneefee allatheena thalamoo innahum mughraqoon

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا ٱسْتَوَيْتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ فَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.translation: And when thou hast embarked on the Ark - thou and those with thee,- say: "Praise be to Allah, Who has saved us from the people who do wrong."
verses.transliteration: Fa-itha istawayta anta waman maAAakaAAala alfulki faquli alhamdu lillahi allatheenajjana mina alqawmi aththalimeen

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلْنِى مُنزَلًا مُّبَارَكًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ
verses.translation: And say: "O my Lord! enable me to disembark with thy blessing: for Thou art the Best to enable (us) to disembark."
verses.transliteration: Waqul rabbi anzilnee munzalan mubarakanwaanta khayru almunzileen

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبْتَلِينَ
verses.translation: Verily in this there are Signs (for men to understand); (thus) do We try (men).
verses.transliteration: Inna fee thalika laayatinwa-in kunna lamubtaleen

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قَرْنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We raised after them another generation.
verses.transliteration: Thumma ansha/na min baAAdihim qarnan akhareen

verses.arabic: فَأَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ رَسُولًا مِّنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: And We sent to them a messenger from among themselves, (saying), "Worship Allah! ye have no other god but Him. Will ye not fear (Him)?"
verses.transliteration: Faarsalna feehim rasoolan minhum anioAAbudoo Allaha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhuafala tattaqoon

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِلِقَآءِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَأَتْرَفْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يَأْكُلُ مِمَّا تَأْكُلُونَ مِنْهُ وَيَشْرَبُ مِمَّا تَشْرَبُونَ
verses.translation: And the chiefs of his people, who disbelieved and denied the Meeting in the Hereafter, and on whom We had bestowed the good things of this life, said: "He is no more than a man like yourselves: he eats of that of which ye eat, and drinks of what ye drink.
verses.transliteration: Waqala almalao min qawmihi allatheenakafaroo wakaththaboo biliqa-i al-akhiratiwaatrafnahum fee alhayati addunyama hatha illa basharun mithlukum ya/kulumimma ta/kuloona minhu wayashrabu mimma tashraboon

verses.arabic: وَلَئِنْ أَطَعْتُم بَشَرًا مِّثْلَكُمْ إِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.translation: "If ye obey a man like yourselves, behold, it is certain ye will be lost.
verses.transliteration: Wala-in ataAAtum basharan mithlakuminnakum ithan lakhasiroon

verses.arabic: أَيَعِدُكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ إِذَا مِتُّمْ وَكُنتُمْ تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخْرَجُونَ
verses.translation: "Does he promise that when ye die and become dust and bones, ye shall be brought forth (again)?
verses.transliteration: AyaAAidukum annakum itha mittumwakuntum turaban waAAithaman annakummukhrajoon

verses.arabic: ۞ هَيْهَاتَ هَيْهَاتَ لِمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: "Far, very far is that which ye are promised!
verses.transliteration: Hayhata hayhata limatooAAadoon

verses.arabic: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ
verses.translation: "There is nothing but our life in this world! We shall die and we live! But we shall never be raised up again!
verses.transliteration: In hiya illa hayatunaaddunya namootu wanahya wamanahnu bimabAAootheen

verses.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا وَمَا نَحْنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: "He is only a man who invents a lie against Allah, but we are not the ones to believe in him!"
verses.transliteration: In huwa illa rajulun iftaraAAala Allahi kathiban wama nahnulahu bimu/mineen

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
verses.translation: (The prophet) said: "O my Lord! help me: for that they accuse me of falsehood."
verses.transliteration: Qala rabbi onsurnee bimakaththaboon

verses.arabic: قَالَ عَمَّا قَلِيلٍ لَّيُصْبِحُنَّ نَـٰدِمِينَ
verses.translation: (Allah) said: "In but a little while, they are sure to be sorry!"
verses.transliteration: Qala AAamma qaleelin layusbihunnanadimeen

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ غُثَآءً ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.translation: Then the Blast overtook them with justice, and We made them as rubbish of dead leaves (floating on the stream of Time)! So away with the people who do wrong!
verses.transliteration: Faakhathat-humu assayhatubilhaqqi fajaAAalnahum ghuthaanfabuAAdan lilqawmi aththalimeen

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We raised after them other generations.
verses.transliteration: Thumma ansha/na min baAAdihimquroonan akhareen

verses.arabic: مَا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ
verses.translation: No people can hasten their term, nor can they delay (it).
verses.transliteration: Ma tasbiqu min ommatin ajalahawama yasta/khiroon

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا تَتْرَا ۖ كُلَّ مَا جَآءَ أُمَّةً رَّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُ ۚ فَأَتْبَعْنَا بَعْضَهُم بَعْضًا وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَحَادِيثَ ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّقَوْمٍ لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Then sent We our messengers in succession: every time there came to a people their messenger, they accused him of falsehood: so We made them follow each other (in punishment): We made them as a tale (that is told): So away with a people that will not believe!
verses.transliteration: Thumma arsalna rusulana tatrakulla ma jaa ommatan rasooluha kaththaboohufaatbaAAna baAAdahum baAAdan wajaAAalnahumahadeetha fabuAAdan liqawmin la yu/minoon

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron, with Our Signs and authority manifest,
verses.transliteration: Thumma arsalna moosa waakhahuharoona bi-ayatina wasultaninmubeen

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا عَالِينَ
verses.translation: To Pharaoh and his Chiefs: But these behaved insolently: they were an arrogant people.
verses.transliteration: Ila firAAawna wamala-ihi fastakbaroowakanoo qawman AAaleen

verses.arabic: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لِبَشَرَيْنِ مِثْلِنَا وَقَوْمُهُمَا لَنَا عَـٰبِدُونَ
verses.translation: They said: "Shall we believe in two men like ourselves? And their people are subject to us!"
verses.transliteration: Faqaloo anu/minu libasharayni mithlinawaqawmuhuma lana AAabidoon

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَكَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْلَكِينَ
verses.translation: So they accused them of falsehood, and they became of those who were destroyed.
verses.transliteration: Fakaththaboohuma fakanoomina almuhlakeen

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.translation: And We gave Moses the Book, in order that they might receive guidance.
verses.transliteration: Walaqad atayna moosaalkitaba laAAallahum yahtadoon

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَأُمَّهُۥٓ ءَايَةً وَءَاوَيْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَىٰ رَبْوَةٍ ذَاتِ قَرَارٍ وَمَعِينٍ
verses.translation: And We made the son of Mary and his mother as a Sign: We gave them both shelter on high ground, affording rest and security and furnished with springs.
verses.transliteration: WajaAAalna ibna maryama waommahu ayatanwaawaynahuma ila rabwatin thatiqararin wamaAAeen

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ صَـٰلِحًا ۖ إِنِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: O ye messengers! enjoy (all) things good and pure, and work righteousness: for I am well-acquainted with (all) that ye do.
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha arrusulukuloo mina attayyibati waAAmaloo salihaninnee bima taAAmaloona AAaleem

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱتَّقُونِ
verses.translation: And verily this Brotherhood of yours is a single Brotherhood, and I am your Lord and Cherisher: therefore fear Me (and no other).
verses.transliteration: Wa-inna hathihi ommatukum ommatan wahidatanwaana rabbukum fattaqoon

verses.arabic: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ زُبُرًا ۖ كُلُّ حِزْبٍۭ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ فَرِحُونَ
verses.translation: But people have cut off their affair (of unity), between them, into sects: each party rejoices in that which is with itself.
verses.transliteration: FataqattaAAoo amrahum baynahumzuburan kullu hizbin bima ladayhim farihoon

verses.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ فِى غَمْرَتِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: But leave them in their confused ignorance for a time.
verses.transliteration: Fatharhum fee ghamratihim hattaheen

verses.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٍ وَبَنِينَ
verses.translation: Do they think that because We have granted them abundance of wealth and sons,
verses.transliteration: Ayahsaboona annama numidduhumbihi min malin wabaneen

verses.arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ ۚ بَل لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: We would hasten them on in every good? Nay, they do not understand.
verses.transliteration: NusariAAu lahum fee alkhayratibal la yashAAuroon

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
verses.translation: Verily those who live in awe for fear of their Lord;
verses.transliteration: Inna allatheena hum min khashyatirabbihim mushfiqoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Those who believe in the Signs of their Lord;
verses.transliteration: Wallatheena hum bi-ayatirabbihim yu/minoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِرَبِّهِمْ لَا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: Those who join not (in worship) partners with their Lord;
verses.transliteration: Wallatheena hum birabbihim layushrikoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَوا۟ وَّقُلُوبُهُمْ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ رَٰجِعُونَ
verses.translation: And those who dispense their charity with their hearts full of fear, because they will return to their Lord;-
verses.transliteration: Wallatheena yu/toona maataw waquloobuhum wajilatun annahum ila rabbihim rajiAAoon

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَهُمْ لَهَا سَـٰبِقُونَ
verses.translation: It is these who hasten in every good work, and these who are foremost in them.
verses.transliteration: Ola-ika yusariAAoona feealkhayrati wahum laha sabiqoon

verses.arabic: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۖ وَلَدَيْنَا كِتَـٰبٌ يَنطِقُ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: On no soul do We place a burden greater than it can bear: before Us is a record which clearly shows the truth: they will never be wronged.
verses.transliteration: Wala nukallifu nafsan illawusAAaha waladayna kitabun yantiqu bilhaqqiwahum la yuthlamoon

verses.arabic: بَلْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلٌ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمْ لَهَا عَـٰمِلُونَ
verses.translation: But their hearts are in confused ignorance of this; and there are, besides that, deeds of theirs, which they will (continue) to do,-
verses.transliteration: Bal quloobuhum fee ghamratin min hathawalahum aAAmalun min dooni thalika hum lahaAAamiloon

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذْنَا مُتْرَفِيهِم بِٱلْعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمْ يَجْـَٔرُونَ
verses.translation: Until, when We seize in Punishment those of them who received the good things of this world, behold, they will groan in supplication!
verses.transliteration: Hatta itha akhathnamutrafeehim bilAAathabi itha hum yaj-aroon

verses.arabic: لَا تَجْـَٔرُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: (It will be said): "Groan not in supplication this day: for ye shall certainly not be helped by Us.
verses.transliteration: La taj-aroo alyawma innakum minnala tunsaroon

verses.arabic: قَدْ كَانَتْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَـٰبِكُمْ تَنكِصُونَ
verses.translation: "My Signs used to be rehearsed to you, but ye used to turn back on your heels-
verses.transliteration: Qad kanat ayatee tutlaAAalaykum fakuntum AAala aAAqabikum tankisoon

verses.arabic: مُسْتَكْبِرِينَ بِهِۦ سَـٰمِرًا تَهْجُرُونَ
verses.translation: "In arrogance: talking nonsense about the (Qur'an), like one telling fables by night."
verses.transliteration: Mustakbireena bihi samiran tahjuroon

verses.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَدَّبَّرُوا۟ ٱلْقَوْلَ أَمْ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمْ يَأْتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Do they not ponder over the Word (of Allah), or has anything (new) come to them that did not come to their fathers of old?
verses.transliteration: Afalam yaddabbaroo alqawla am jaahumma lam ya/ti abaahumu al-awwaleen

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَمْ يَعْرِفُوا۟ رَسُولَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they not recognise their Messenger, that they deny him?
verses.transliteration: Am lam yaAArifoo rasoolahum fahum lahumunkiroon

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌۢ ۚ بَلْ جَآءَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَـٰرِهُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they say, "He is possessed"? Nay, he has brought them the Truth, but most of them hate the Truth.
verses.transliteration: Am yaqooloona bihi jinnatun bal jaahumbilhaqqi waaktharuhum lilhaqqi karihoon

verses.arabic: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْحَقُّ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّ ۚ بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِذِكْرِهِمْ فَهُمْ عَن ذِكْرِهِم مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.translation: If the Truth had been in accord with their desires, truly the heavens and the earth, and all beings therein would have been in confusion and corruption! Nay, We have sent them their admonition, but they turn away from their admonition.
verses.transliteration: Walawi ittabaAAa alhaqqu ahwaahumlafasadati assamawatu wal-arduwaman feehinna bal ataynahum bithikrihim fahum AAanthikrihim muAAridoon

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ خَرْجًا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
verses.translation: Or is it that thou askest them for some recompense? But the recompense of thy Lord is best: He is the Best of those who give sustenance.
verses.transliteration: Am tas-aluhum kharjan fakharajurabbika khayrun wahuwa khayru arraziqeen

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَتَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.translation: But verily thou callest them to the Straight Way;
verses.transliteration: Wa-innaka latadAAoohum ila siratinmustaqeem

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَـٰكِبُونَ
verses.translation: And verily those who believe not in the Hereafter are deviating from that Way.
verses.transliteration: Wa-inna allatheena layu/minoona bil-akhirati AAani assiratilanakiboon

verses.arabic: ۞ وَلَوْ رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ وَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرٍّ لَّلَجُّوا۟ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
verses.translation: If We had mercy on them and removed the distress which is on them, they would obstinately persist in their transgression, wandering in distraction to and fro.
verses.transliteration: Walaw rahimnahum wakashafnama bihim min durrin lalajjoo fee tughyanihimyaAAmahoon

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمْ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
verses.translation: We inflicted Punishment on them, but they humbled not themselves to their Lord, nor do they submissively entreat (Him)!-
verses.transliteration: Walaqad akhathnahum bilAAathabifama istakanoo lirabbihim wama yatadarraAAoon

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًا ذَا عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمْ فِيهِ مُبْلِسُونَ
verses.translation: Until We open on them a gate leading to a severe Punishment: then Lo! they will be plunged in despair therein!
verses.transliteration: Hatta itha fatahnaAAalayhim baban tha AAathabin shadeedin ithahum feehi mublisoon

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: It is He Who has created for you (the faculties of) hearing, sight, feeling and understanding: little thanks it is ye give!
verses.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee anshaa lakumu assamAAawal-absara wal-af-idata qaleelan matashkuroon

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
verses.translation: And He has multiplied you through the earth, and to Him shall ye be gathered back.
verses.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee tharaakum feeal-ardi wa-ilayhi tuhsharoon

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: It is He Who gives life and death, and to Him (is due) the alternation of Night and Day: will ye not then understand?
verses.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee yuhyeewayumeetu walahu ikhtilafu allayli wannahariafala taAAqiloon

verses.arabic: بَلْ قَالُوا۟ مِثْلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.translation: On the contrary they say things similar to what the ancients said.
verses.transliteration: Bal qaloo mithla ma qalaal-awwaloon

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: They say: "What! when we die and become dust and bones, could we really be raised up again?
verses.transliteration: Qaloo a-itha mitnawakunna turaban waAAithamana-inna lamabAAoothoon

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَـٰذَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: "Such things have been promised to us and to our fathers before! they are nothing but tales of the ancients!"
verses.transliteration: Laqad wuAAidna nahnu waabaonahatha min qablu in hatha illa asateerual-awwaleen

verses.arabic: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Say: "To whom belong the earth and all beings therein? (say) if ye know!"
verses.transliteration: Qul limani al-ardu waman feehain kuntum taAAlamoon

verses.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: They will say, "To Allah!" say: "Yet will ye not receive admonition?"
verses.transliteration: Sayaqooloona lillahi qul afalatathakkaroon

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبْعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Say: "Who is the Lord of the seven heavens, and the Lord of the Throne (of Glory) Supreme?"
verses.transliteration: Qul man rabbu assamawatiassabAAi warabbu alAAarshi alAAatheem

verses.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: They will say, "(They belong) to Allah." Say: "Will ye not then be filled with awe?"
verses.transliteration: Sayaqooloona lillahi qul afalatattaqoon

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَنۢ بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيْهِ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Say: "Who is it in whose hands is the governance of all things,- who protects (all), but is not protected (of any)? (say) if ye know."
verses.transliteration: Qul man biyadihi malakootu kulli shay-inwahuwa yujeeru wala yujaru AAalayhi in kuntumtaAAlamoon

verses.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ فَأَنَّىٰ تُسْحَرُونَ
verses.translation: They will say, "(It belongs) to Allah." Say: "Then how are ye deluded?"
verses.transliteration: Sayaqooloona lillahi qul faannatusharoon

verses.arabic: بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
verses.translation: We have sent them the Truth: but they indeed practise falsehood!
verses.transliteration: Bal ataynahum bilhaqqiwa-innahum lakathiboon

verses.arabic: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٍ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ ۚ إِذًا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَـٰهٍۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: No son did Allah beget, nor is there any god along with Him: (if there were many gods), behold, each god would have taken away what he had created, and some would have lorded it over others! Glory to Allah! (He is free) from the (sort of) things they attribute to Him!
verses.transliteration: Ma ittakhatha Allahumin waladin wama kana maAAahu min ilahin ithanlathahaba kullu ilahin bima khalaqa walaAAalabaAAduhum AAala baAAdin subhana AllahiAAamma yasifoon

verses.arabic: عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: He knows what is hidden and what is open: too high is He for the partners they attribute to Him!
verses.transliteration: AAalimi alghaybi washshahadatifataAAala AAamma yushrikoon

verses.arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّى مَا يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: Say: "O my Lord! if Thou wilt show me (in my lifetime) that which they are warned against,-
verses.transliteration: Qul rabbi imma turiyannee mayooAAadoon

verses.arabic: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجْعَلْنِى فِى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.translation: "Then, O my Lord! put me not amongst the people who do wrong!"
verses.transliteration: Rabbi fala tajAAalnee fee alqawmi aththalimeen

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمْ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We are certainly able to show thee (in fulfilment) that against which they are warned.
verses.transliteration: Wa-inna AAala an nuriyaka manaAAiduhum laqadiroon

verses.arabic: ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ ۚ نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: Repel evil with that which is best: We are well acquainted with the things they say.
verses.transliteration: IdfaAA billatee hiya ahsanu assayyi-atanahnu aAAlamu bima yasifoon

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ
verses.translation: And say "O my Lord! I seek refuge with Thee from the suggestions of the Evil Ones.
verses.transliteration: Waqul rabbi aAAoothu bika min hamazatiashshayateen

verses.arabic: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَن يَحْضُرُونِ
verses.translation: "And I seek refuge with Thee O my Lord! lest they should come near me."
verses.transliteration: WaaAAoothu bika rabbi an yahduroon

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرْجِعُونِ
verses.translation: (In Falsehood will they be) Until, when death comes to one of them, he says: "O my Lord! send me back (to life),-
verses.transliteration: Hatta itha jaa ahadahumualmawtu qala rabbi irjiAAoon

verses.arabic: لَعَلِّىٓ أَعْمَلُ صَـٰلِحًا فِيمَا تَرَكْتُ ۚ كَلَّآ ۚ إِنَّهَا كَلِمَةٌ هُوَ قَآئِلُهَا ۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِم بَرْزَخٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: "In order that I may work righteousness in the things I neglected." - "By no means! It is but a word he says."- Before them is a Partition till the Day they are raised up.
verses.transliteration: LaAAallee aAAmalu salihanfeema taraktu kalla innaha kalimatun huwa qa-iluhawamin wara-ihim barzakhun ila yawmi yubAAathoon

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: Then when the Trumpet is blown, there will be no more relationships between them that Day, nor will one ask after another!
verses.transliteration: Fa-itha nufikha fee assoorifala ansaba baynahum yawma-ithin walayatasaaloon

verses.arabic: فَمَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: Then those whose balance (of good deeds) is heavy,- they will attain salvation:
verses.transliteration: Faman thaqulat mawazeenuhu faola-ikahumu almuflihoon

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فِى جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.translation: But those whose balance is light, will be those who have lost their souls, in Hell will they abide.
verses.transliteration: Waman khaffat mawazeenuhu faola-ikaallatheena khasiroo anfusahum fee jahannama khalidoon

verses.arabic: تَلْفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمْ فِيهَا كَـٰلِحُونَ
verses.translation: The Fire will burn their faces, and they will therein grin, with their lips displaced.
verses.transliteration: Talfahu wujoohahumu annaruwahum feeha kalihoon

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: "Were not My Signs rehearsed to you, and ye did but treat them as falsehood?"
verses.transliteration: Alam takun ayatee tutlaAAalaykum fakuntum biha tukaththiboon

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْنَا شِقْوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوْمًا ضَآلِّينَ
verses.translation: They will say: "our Lord! Our misfortune overwhelmed us, and we became a people astray!
verses.transliteration: Qaloo rabbana ghalabatAAalayna shiqwatuna wakunna qawman dalleen

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا مِنْهَا فَإِنْ عُدْنَا فَإِنَّا ظَـٰلِمُونَ
verses.translation: "Our Lord! bring us out of this: if ever we return (to Evil), then shall we be wrong-doers indeed!"
verses.transliteration: Rabbana akhrijna minhafa-in AAudna fa-inna thalimoon

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱخْسَـُٔوا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تُكَلِّمُونِ
verses.translation: He will say: "Be ye driven into it (with ignominy)! And speak ye not to Me!
verses.transliteration: Qala ikhsaoo feeha walatukallimoon

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَرِيقٌ مِّنْ عِبَادِى يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.translation: "A part of My servants there was, who used to pray 'our Lord! we believe; then do Thou forgive us, and have mercy upon us: For Thou art the Best of those who show mercy!"
verses.transliteration: Innahu kana fareequn min AAibadeeyaqooloona rabbana amanna faghfirlana warhamna waanta khayru arrahimeen

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوْكُمْ ذِكْرِى وَكُنتُم مِّنْهُمْ تَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: "But ye treated them with ridicule, so much so that (ridicule of) them made you forget My Message while ye were laughing at them!
verses.transliteration: Fattakhathtumoohumsikhriyyan hatta ansawkum thikree wakuntumminhum tadhakoon

verses.arabic: إِنِّى جَزَيْتُهُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
verses.translation: "I have rewarded them this Day for their patience and constancy: they are indeed the ones that have achieved Bliss..."
verses.transliteration: Innee jazaytuhumu alyawma bima sabarooannahum humu alfa-izoon

verses.arabic: قَـٰلَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ
verses.translation: He will say: "What number of years did ye stay on earth?"
verses.transliteration: Qala kam labithtum fee al-ardiAAadada sineen

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ فَسْـَٔلِ ٱلْعَآدِّينَ
verses.translation: They will say: "We stayed a day or part of a day: but ask those who keep account."
verses.transliteration: Qaloo labithna yawman aw baAAdayawmin fas-ali alAAaddeen

verses.arabic: قَـٰلَ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا ۖ لَّوْ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: He will say: "Ye stayed not but a little,- if ye had only known!
verses.transliteration: Qala in labithtum illaqaleelan law annakum kuntum taAAlamoon

verses.arabic: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ أَنَّمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ عَبَثًا وَأَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: "Did ye then think that We had created you in jest, and that ye would not be brought back to Us (for account)?"
verses.transliteration: Afahasibtum annama khalaqnakumAAabathan waannakum ilayna la turjaAAoon

verses.arabic: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: Therefore exalted be Allah, the King, the Reality: there is no god but He, the Lord of the Throne of Honour!
verses.transliteration: FataAAala Allahualmaliku alhaqqu la ilaha illa huwarabbu alAAarshi alkareem

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرْهَـٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.translation: If anyone invokes, besides Allah, Any other god, he has no authority therefor; and his reckoning will be only with his Lord! and verily the Unbelievers will fail to win through!
verses.transliteration: Waman yadAAu maAAa Allahi ilahanakhara la burhana lahu bihi fa-innamahisabuhu AAinda rabbihi innahu la yuflihualkafiroon

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.translation: So say: "O my Lord! grant Thou forgiveness and mercy for Thou art the Best of those who show mercy!"
verses.transliteration: Waqul rabbi ighfir warhamwaanta khayru arrahimeen
